objective: Elucidate basic computer networking; Demonstration of application layer protocols; Explain routers, IP and routing algorithms in the network layer
outcomes: Explain the use of computer networking and layering concepts; Explain the principles of application layer protocols

units.name: Computer Networks and the Internet
units.description: Computer networking refers to interconnected computing devices that can exchange data and share resources with each other. These networked devices use a system of rules, called communications protocols, to transmit information over physical or wireless technologies.

topics.name: What is the internet?
topics.objectives: To understand the basics of Computer networks and Internet
topics.outcomes: You will understand the basics of Compute networks and Internet
